oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Promissary note for the hiring of several slaves
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: William T. Myers paid $422 to Jonathan Eakin, administrator of the estate of Abram Myers, to hire several slaves. The names listed include Paul, George, Elick, Elijah, Lettie, Celia, Emily, Jerry, Lewis, Caroline, and William. He also paid $120 to hire Betsy, Amy and Emily for the year 1850.
